description: A representation of the capability of material that is committed, available, or unattainable for a specific time shall be presented as a material capability.
title: Material capability
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The related object(s) makes up part of this material capability as the whole
The values in the material capability property are for this material capability.

A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material class or set of material classes of the specification for a specific process segment

A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material definition or set of material definition of the specification for a specific process segment

A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material lot or set of material lot of the specification for a specific process segment

A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material sublot or set of material sublot of the specification for a specific process segment. Typically, either a material class or material definition is specified

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.
Not part of the Standard Specs.

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information about the process segment

links.dtdl:name: spatialDefinition
links.dtdl:description: Spatially defines the equipment as a zero-dimensional point, one dimensional line, or two dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

oneOf.$comment: : capacity that is committed for future productive use.
capacity that is not attainable for future productive use given the equipment condition, equipment utilization, personnel availability or material availability.
capacity that is available for additional future productive use.
a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity with acceptable quality.
a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity that was not used or had unacceptable quality.
the sum of used and unused capability or the sum of available, unattainable and committed capability.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Defines the reason for the capability type.

confidenceFactor.title: Confidence Factor
confidenceFactor.description: Measure of the confidence of the ability to obtain the capacity value.

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

storageLocation.title: Storage location
storageLocation.description: Identifies the storage location of  the material resource(s) specified by this material segment specification

storageLocationType.title: Storage location type
storageLocationType.description: Indicates whether the storage location attribute refers to an operational location, equipment or physical asset object, or contains a description of the storage location
storageLocationType.comment: Mandatory where a storage location is specified

oneOf.title: Operational Location
oneOf.$comment: storage location attribute references an operational location

oneOf.title: Operational Location
oneOf.$comment: storage location attribute references an equipment object

oneOf.title: Physical Asset
oneOf.$comment: storage location attribute references a physical asset

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.$comment: storage location attribute contains a description of the storage location, such as a street address

materialUse.title: Material use
materialUse.description: Defines the use of the material class, material definition, material lot, or material sublot in the context of the process segment.

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: The starting time associated with the material capability.

endTime.title: End Time
endTime.description: The ending time associated with the material capability.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Specifies the amount of material produced or used by the parent segment.

quantityUnitOfMeasure.title: Quantity unit of measure
quantityUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity

assemblyType.title: Assembly type
assemblyType.description: Defines the type of the assembly

oneOf.description: the components of the assembly are physically connected or in the same area
the components of the assembly are not necessarily physically connected or in the same area

assemblyRelationship.title: Assembly relationship
assemblyRelationship.description: Defines the type of the relationships

oneOf.description: an assembly that is not intended to be split during the production process
a temporary assembly using during production, such as a pallet of different materials or a batch kit
